claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Committee of Public Safety  (  Comit√© de salut public  )  -- created in April 1793 by the National Convention and then restructured in July 1793 -- formed the de facto executive government in France during the Reign of Terror  (  1793 -- 94  )  , a stage of the French Revolution .

claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Committee of Public Safety succeeded the previous Committee of General Defence  (  established in January 1793  )  and assumed its role of protecting the newly established republic against foreign attacks and internal rebellion .

claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As a wartime measure , the Committee -- composed at first of nine , and later of twelve , members -- was given broad supervisory powers over military , judicial , and legislative efforts .

claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It was formed as an administrative body to supervise and expedite the work of the executive bodies of the Convention and of the government ministers appointed by the Convention .

claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As the Committee tried to meet the dangers of a coalition of European nations and counter-revolutionary forces within the country , it became more and more powerful .

claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In July 1793 , following the defeat at the Convention of the Girondins , the prominent leader of the radical Jacobin , Maximilien Robespierre , was added to the Committee .

claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The power of the Committee peaked between August 1793 and July 1794 .

claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In December 1793 , the Convention formally conferred executive power upon the Committee .

claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The execution of Robespierre in July 1794 represented a reactionary period against the Committee of Public Safety .

claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: This is known as the Thermidorian Reaction , as Robespierre 's fall from power occurred during the Revolutionary month of Thermidor .

claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Committee 's influence diminished , and it was disestablished in 1795 .

claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Committee of Safety  (  American Revolution  )  , established throughout the Thirteen Colonies at the start of the American Revolution

claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The dictatorship imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the Reign of Terror , from 1793 until 1794 , established price controls on food and other items , abolished slavery in French colonies abroad , dechristianised society through the creation of a new calendar and the expulsion of religious figures , and secured the borders of the new republic from its enemies .

claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Revolution overthrew the monarchy , established a republic , experienced violent periods of political turmoil , and finally culminated in a dictatorship under Napoleon that rapidly brought many of its principles to Western Europe and beyond .

claim: A dictatorship was imposed by the Committee of Public Safety during the American Revolution.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Following the Seven Years ' War and the American Revolutionary War , the French government was deeply in debt and attempted to restore its financial status through unpopular taxation schemes .
